00120                         $this->UserAlgorithms = get_package( 'user::user_algorithms' , 'last' , __FILE__ );

00182             private function  compile_query_string( $CommonStateConfigPath )
00183             {
00184                   try
00185                   {
00186                         $Conf = $this->CachedMultyFS->file_get_contents( $CommonStateConfigPath );
00187                         $Conf = str_replace( '{prefix}' , $this->Prefix , $Conf );
00188                         $this->Settings->load_settings( $Conf );
00189                         $Fields = $this->Settings->get_setting( 'search_fields' , false );
00190                         
00191                         if( $Fields !== false )
00192                         {
00193                               $Fields = explode( ',' , $Fields );
00194                               
00195                               $this->QueryString = $this->Search->build_query_string( $Fields );
00196                         }
00197                   }
00198                   catch( Exception $e )
00199                   {
00200                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00201                   }
00202             }
00203             
00222             private function  build_query_string( $Options )
00223             {
00224                   try
00225                   {
00226                         $this->QueryString = '1 = 1';
00227                         $SearchString = $this->Security->get_gp( 'search_string' , 'string' , '' );
00228                         
00229                         if( strlen( $SearchString ) )
00230                         {
00231                               $CommonStateConfigFileName = $Options->get_setting( 
00232                                     'common_state_config_search_form' , 'cfcxs_search_form'
00233                               );
00234                               
00235                               $ComponentPath = dirname( $Options->get_setting( 'file_path' ) );
00236                               
00237                               $CommonStateConfigPath = "$ComponentPath/conf/$CommonStateConfigFileName";
00238                               
00239                               if( $this->CachedMultyFS->file_exists( $CommonStateConfigPath ) )
00240                               {
00241                                     $this->compile_query_string( $CommonStateConfigPath );
00242                               }
00243                         }
00244                   }
00245                   catch( Exception $e )
00246                   {
00247                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00248                   }
00249             }

00277             function                process_form( $Options , $Form )
00278             {
00279                   try
00280                   {
00281                         $Changed = false;
00282                         
00283                         list( $Form , $Changed )= $this->ContextSet->process_prefix( $Options , $Form , $Changed );
00284                         
00285                         $Form = $this->ContextSet->process_string( $Options , $Form , $Changed );
00286 
00287                         return( $Form );
00288                   }
00289                   catch( Exception $e )
00290                   {
00291                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00292                   }
00293             }

00313             function                list_form( $Options )
00314             {
00315                   try
00316                   {
00317                         /* getting packages */
00318                         $Paging = get_package( 'gui::paging' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00319                         
00320                         /* Paging primary initialization */
00321                         $Paging->set( 'FormId' , $this->Prefix.'_form' );
00322                         $Paging->set( 'Prefix' , $this->Prefix );
00323 
00324                         /* Header buttons creation */
00325                         $HeaderFields = 
00326                               '<input type="hidden" name="{prefix}_context_action" id="{prefix}_context_action" value="">
00327                               <input type="hidden" name="{prefix}_action" id="{prefix}_action" value="">
00328                               <input type="hidden" name="{prefix}_record_id" id="{prefix}_record_id" value="">';
00329                               
00330                         $Paging->set( 'CustomButtons' , $HeaderFields );
00331 
00332                         $this->build_query_string( $Options );
00333                         
00334                         $this->ContextSetUtilities->set_header_template( $Options , $Paging );
00335                         $this->ContextSetUtilities->set_item_template( $Options , $Paging );
00336                         $this->ContextSetUtilities->set_no_data_found_message( $Options , $Paging );
00337                         $this->ContextSetUtilities->set_footer_template( $Options , $Paging );
00338                         $this->ContextSetUtilities->set_main_settings( $Options , $Paging );
00339                         $this->ContextSetUtilities->set_grid_data( $Options , $Paging , $this->QueryString );
00340 
00341                         /* compilation */
00342                         $this->Provider->Output = $Paging->draw( false , $Options );
00343 
00344                         /* Compiling custom buttons */
00345                         $CommonStateConfig = $Options->get_setting( 
00346                               'common_state_config_list_buttons' , 'cfcxs_list_buttons'
00347                         );
00348 
00349                         $ComponentPath = dirname( $Options->get_setting( 'file_path' ) );
00350                         $CommonStateConfigPath = "$ComponentPath/conf/$CommonStateConfig";
00351                         if( $this->CachedMultyFS->file_exists( $CommonStateConfigPath ) )
00352                         {
00353                               $Config = $this->CachedMultyFS->file_get_contents( $CommonStateConfigPath );
00354                               $RecordListSettings->load_settings( $Config );
00355                               $TemplateFileName = $RecordListSettings->get_setting( 'additional_buttons' );
00356                               $TemplateFilePath = "$ComponentPath/res/templates/$TemplateFileName";
00357                               $TemplateContent = $this->CachedMultyFS->file_get_contents( $TemplateFilePath );
00358                               
00359                               $this->Provider->Output = str_replace( 
00360                                     '{list_buttons}' , $TemplateContent , $this->Provider->Output
00361                               );
00362                         }
00363                         
00364                         $this->process_form( $Options , $this->Provider->Output );
00365 
00366                         $this->Provider->Output = $this->PageComposer->execute_processors( 
00367                               $this->Provider->Output , 'process_string'
00368                         );
00369                   }
00370                   catch( Exception $e )
00371                   {
00372                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00373                   }
00374             }

00394             function                create_form( &$Options )
00395             {
00396                   try
00397                   {
00398                         if( $Options->get_setting( 'default_form' , 1 ) == 0 )
00399                         {
00400                               call_user_func( array( $this->Provider , 'create_form' ) , $Options );
00401                         }
00402                         else
00403                         {
00404                               $FormTemplate = $Options->get_setting( 'form_template' , 'create_form' ).'.tpl';
00405                               $Form = $this->CachedMultyFS->get_template( $Options->get_setting( 'file_path' ) , $FormTemplate );
00406                               $Form = str_replace( '{state}' , 'create_record' , $Form );
00407                               if( $Options->get_setting( 'get_post_extraction_script' , false ) )
00408                               {
00409                                     $ExtractionScript = $Options->get_setting( 'get_post_extraction_script' );
00410                                     $Record = $this->Security->parse_http_parameters( $ExtractionScript );
00411                                     $Form = $this->String->print_record( $Form , $Record );
00412                               }
00413                               $this->Provider->Output = $Form;
00414                         }
00415                         
00416                         $this->process_form( $Options , $this->Provider->Output );
00417                   }
00418                   catch( Exception $e )
00419                   {
00420                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00421                   }
00422             }

00472             function                update_form( &$Options )
00473             {
00474                   try
00475                   {
00476                         if( $Options->get_setting( 'default_form' , 1 ) == 0 )
00477                         {
00478                               call_user_func( array( $this->Provider , 'update_form' ) , $Options );
00479                         }
00480                         else
00481                         {
00482                               $IdList = $this->ContextSetUtilities->get_posted_ids( $this->Prefix );
00483                               $Record = $this->ContextSetUtilities->get_data_record( $Options , $IdList );
00484                               $Record = $this->ContextSetUtilities->extract_data_from_request(
00485                                     $Options , $Record , 'get_post_extraction_script' , $this->Prefix
00486                               );
00487                               $FormTemplate = $Options->get_setting( 'form_template' , 'update_form' );
00488                               $Form = $this->ContextSetUtilities->get_form( $Options , $IdList , $FormTemplate , $this->Prefix );
00489                               $this->Provider->Output = $this->ContextSetUtilities->set_form_data( $Form , $Record );
00490                         }
00491 
00492                         $this->process_form( $Options , $this->Provider->Output );
00493                   }
00494                   catch( Exception $e )
00495                   {
00496                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00497                   }
00498             }

00554                         $Record = $this->ContextSetUtilities->get_data_record( $Options , $IdList );

00591             function                json_data( &$Options )
00592             {
00593                   try
00594                   {
00595                         $DataProvider = $this->ContextSetUtilities->get_data_provider( $Options , $this->Provider );
00596                         
00597                         if( method_exists( $DataProvider , 'select' ) === false )
00598                         {
00599                               $ClassName = $DataProvider ? get_class( $DataProvider ) : 'undefined_class';
00600                               throw( new Exception( 'Method "select" was not found in the class "'.$ClassName."'" ) );
00601                         }
00602                         
00603                         $Start = $this->Security->get_gp( 'start' , 'integer' , false );
00604                         $Limit = $this->Security->get_gp( 'limit' , 'integer' , false );
00605                         $Field = $this->Security->get_gp( 'field' , 'command' , false );
00606                         $Order = $this->Security->get_gp( 'order' , 'command' , false );
00607                         
00608                         $Records = call_user_func( array( $DataProvider , 'select' ) , $Start , $Limit , $Field , $Order );
00609                         
00610                         $Object = new stdClass;
00611                         set_field( $Object , 'records' , $Records );
00612                         set_field( $Object , 'count' , count( $Records ) );
00613                         
00614                         $JSON = get_package( 'json' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00615                         $this->Provider->Output = $JSON->encode( $Object );
00616                   }
00617                   catch( Exception $e )
00618                   {
00619                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00620                   }
00621             }

00645             function                get_grid_templates( &$Options )
00646             {
00647                   try
00648                   {
00649                         $Header = $Options->get_setting( 'header' , '' );
00650                         if( $Header !== '' )
00651                         {
00652                               $Header = dirname( $Options->get_setting( 'file_path' ) )."/res/templates/$Header.tpl";
00653                               $Header = $this->CachedMultyFS->file_get_contents( $Header );
00654                         }
00655                         
00656                         $Item = $Options->get_setting( 'item' );
00657                         $Item = dirname( $Options->get_setting( 'file_path' ) )."/res/templates/$Item.tpl";
00658                         $Item = $this->CachedMultyFS->file_get_contents( $Item );
00659                         
00660                         $Footer = $Options->get_setting( 'footer' , '' );
00661                         if( $Footer !== '' )
00662                         {
00663                               $Footer = dirname( $Options->get_setting( 'file_path' ) )."/res/templates/$Footer.tpl";
00664                               $Footer = $this->CachedMultyFS->file_get_contents( $Footer );
00665                         }
00666                         
00667                         return( array( $Header , $Item , $Footer ) );
00668                   }
00669                   catch( Exception $e )
00670                   {
00671                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00672                   }
00673             }

00693             function                last_records_form( &$Options )
00694             {
00695                   try
00696                   {
00697                         $DataProvider = $this->ContextSetUtilities->get_data_provider( $Options , $this->Provider );
00698                         
00699                         $FunctionName = $Options->get_setting( 'select_func' , 'select' );
00700                         
00701                         $Limit = $Options->get_setting( 'records_count' , 3 );
00702                         
00703                         $Records = call_user_func( array( $DataProvider , $FunctionName ) , 0 , $Limit , 'id' , 'DESC' );
00704                         
00705                         list( $Header , $Item , $Footer ) = $this->get_grid_templates( $Options );
00706                         
00707                         $Items = '';
00708                         
00709                         foreach( $Records as $i => $Record )
00710                         {
00711                               $Items .= $this->String->print_record( $Item , $Record );
00712                         }
00713                         
00714                         $this->Provider->Output = $Header.$Items.$Footer;
00715                   }
00716                   catch( Exception $e )
00717                   {
00718                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00719                   }
00720             }

00744             function                get_select_condition( &$Options )
00745             {
00746                   try
00747                   {
00748                         $MasterType = $Options->get_setting( 'master_type' , 'user' );
00749                         
00750                         if( $MasterType == 'user' && $MasterId == false )
00751                         {
00752                               return( "owner = ".$this->UserAlgorithms->get_id() );
00753                         }
00754                         else
00755                         {
00756                               throw( new Exception( "Illegal parameters of dependent records detection" ) );
00757                         }
00758                   }
00759                   catch( Exception $e )
00760                   {
00761                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00762                   }
00763             }

00802                         {

00804                         }
